distanceFromTrackPoint.description:
The minimum distance from the track point that the drone will be fly to using the mission route.
If it is impossible to fly to the requested point with the requested distance, the system can increase the distance.
If that field is not set - FlightOps will use the config default.

trackPointAGL.description:
If the point is above the ground DTM data then the parameter will be added to the point altitude.
Default is 0.

setAngleToTarget.description:
If true - the mission route calculation will use the angleToTrackPoint parameter.
If false - default configuration will be used and the drone will fly to the shortest route.

isAGLFlight.description:
If AGL flight defined then the mission route will calculated according to the missionAGL field.
In case of false - the flight will be according to the drone operational altitude.

missionAGL.description:
The AGL flight requested altitude.
The field is requiered if siAGLFlight is set to true.
